column3: FAO 4 Carbon stock change in forests to IPCC 3.B.1 Forest land
FAO 4.B Net forest conversion to IPCC Net forest conversion
FAO 5.A Drained grassland to IPCC 3.B.3 Grassland (drained organic soils)
FAO 5.B Drained cropland to IPCC 3.B.2 Cropland (drained organic soils)
FAO 6.A forest fires to IPCC M.3.C.1.a Biomass burning in forest lands (M category because it is not contained in the 3.C.1 sum)
FAO 6.B savanna fires to IPCC M.3.C.1.c Biomass burning in grasslands (M category because it is not contained in the 3.C.1 sum)
FAO 6.C Fires in organic soils to IPCC 3.B.3 cropland (fires in organic soils)
